title: PHPstrtolower()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPstrtolower()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Convert all characters to lowercase:
<?php
echo strtolower("Hello WORLD.");
?>

Definition and Usage
The strtolower() function converts a string to lowercase.
Note:
This function is binary-safe.
Related functions:
strtoupper()
- converts a string to uppercase
lcfirst()
- converts the first character of a string to lowercase
ucfirst()
- converts the first character of a string to uppercase
ucwords()
- converts the first character of each word in a string to uppercase
Syntax
strtolower(
string
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. Specifies the string to convert
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns the the lowercased string
PHP Version:
4+

+1
